title: Youth of May
overview: Set in 1980 during the Gwangju Uprising, This drama tells the love story of a medical student Hwang Hee Tae and a nurse Kim Myung Hee. Their love seems destined by fate.Hee Tae is a medical student, who entered medical school at the top his class. He seems like an easygoing person, but he also has an unyielding spirit and obstinacy. Myung Hee has worked as a nurse for the past 3 years. She is a lovely person, who stands up against what is not fair.
